name: AESP2020
0:
”Alexa, ask a. e. s. p. twenty twenty to play a trivia game”
”Alexa, ask a. e. s. p. twenty twenty for the wifi password”
”Alexa, ask a. e. s. p. twenty twenty to tell me an energy joke”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. e. s. p. twenty twenty
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AESP has partnered with ICF to bring you the AESP 2020 Alexa skill, an interactive and fun way to get more out of your conference experience. 
Want to give it a spin? 
First say,
“Alexa, ask A. E. S. P. 20 20…
then say one of the following phrases:
…to tell me a joke.”
…to play a trivia game.”
…about exhibitors.”
…about 1990.”
…for the wifi password.
…about massages/headshots/opening plenary/closing plenary/special event.”
Not sure what you’re looking for? Say “Help” from within the skill to hear all the ways you can interact with the skill.
Also, each day of the conference, the first five trivia players to answer all three questions correctly will win a Starbucks gift card!
Brought to you by ICF.
ICF helps utilities increase customer engagement and satisfaction via our Voice for Utilities offering that includes consulting, app development, and activation.
Go to icf.com/voice to learn more!
